Name: Miguel Fernando
description:
Miguel is a hardworking young man who lives with his family in the community of San Jos√© de Huaca. He works as a day laborer and farmer.

Miguel recently planted seed potatoes on a rented plot of land. He is confident that he will have an abundant harvest of quality potatoes since he has put so much love and dedication into his work.

Miguel is requesting a new loan to buy composts, fertilizers, and other farming supplies. He aspires to earn a good profit this season.
